html:
Those toilets covered in shit
Those obscure, smelly hallways
Sight of zombie people
Artificially existing
Constant stalking by care workers
A court case
There is no way to get hammered
There is no way to get laid
Sharing plastic dishes
That are reusable
Among all the drooling
Skewed snouts
Ninetees internet
A roommate
Jerks off each evening
Devil shows up in my dreams
title: Toilets
